title: People having trouble launching the game
body:
ive had some trouble opening lol, (for the first time) it always said "http error" 
ibe tried many different solutions but didnt get them too work, so i tried too open league with lol.launcher.admin (wich u might not be supposed to but fuck it) and it worked! maybee if u have the same problem try this!

replies.body: I'm assuming the error you received was a RADS error, which can indicate a permissions issue preventing your game from launching.  I suggest going over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide for a more permanent fix to make sure the game has access to work.  Hope that helps!
